long_description: While the stainless-steel Gerber Compact Sport Multi-Pliers 400 Multitool may be small, it compensates by delivering all the same functionality and rugged performance of its bigger brothers. Includes needlenose pliers, partially serrated blade, Fiskars scissors, wire cutter, wire crimper, can opener, bottle opener, Phillips screwdriver and 3 flat screwdrivers. Patented 1-handed design opens easily with the flick of your wrist; Saf.T.Plus locking system secures components in place. The Gerber Compact Sport Multi-Pliers 400 Multitool features a non-reflective coating.
short_description: While the stainless-steel Gerber Compact Sport Multi-Pliers 400 Multitool may be small, it compensates by delivering all the same functionality and rugged performance of its bigger brothers.
